this_title: Imagine Damon and Jamie's Excellent Adventure
introduction: http://www.monkeyjourneytothewest.comAlan Yentob takes a look at the latest project of Damon Albarn and Jamie Hewlett, an operatic adaptation of Wu Cheng'en's epic novel 'Monkey: Journey to the West' in collaboration with acclaimed theatre and opera director Chen Shi-Zheng.记录了Gorillaz的两位成员（Damon Albarn 和 Jamie Hewlett）与华裔导演陈士争合作一同完成基于中国经典文学作品《西游记》的现代戏剧：《Monkey：Journey to the West》。imagine.damon.and.jamies.excellent.adventure.ws.pdtv.xvid-remax在线观看地址（需注册）http://www.blurcast.tv/watch/423196
